title: Hit and run in delhi
selftext:
Today in Delhi, a drunk reckless driver attempted to flee after hitting a scooty. When stopped and confronted he turned aggressive and refused to cooperate. He even resorted to threats and ran away after this 
I have posted on twitter as well retweet would be appreciated!  

https://x.com/talwar_tarush/status/1773782378538000768?s=46
